content: Union Budget 2024: The government expects to collect Rs 27,625 crore from STT in FY24, which is 10.5 percent higher than the revised budget estimate for FY23. However, STT accounts for just about 1.5 percent of the direct tax collection estimate of Rs 18.24 lakh crore.

content: Spot gold was up 0.4% at $2,025.99 per ounce by 0403 GMT. U.S. gold futures also rose 0.4% to $2,025.20.

headline: Moneycontrol Pro Weekender | Bulls roar in whirlwind week
content: Market salutes conservative Budget stance

headline: Orient Green Power cuts right issue size; stock soars 240% in a year
content: Shares of Orient Green Power have jumped 15 percent in the last three days, hitting 5 percent upper circuit for 3 straight sessions

headline: “AI + people” dominant discussion in India, “AI + replacement” in the West, says Ex-Aadhaar architect Pramod Verma
content: While AI is poised to impact certain job roles in the economy, it will concurrently create more opportunities, Verma said.

headline: Large number of messages from bots, unrelated accounts: brokerage on #BoycottZerodha
content: The brokerage also explained why the platform launched in October 2023 wasn't made available to the trader

headline: More than 100 stocks gain between 10-47% in Budget week
content: A breakout above 22,150, Nifty may experience upward momentum, potentially reaching levels such as 22,500 and beyond, says Rupak De, Senior Technical Analyst, LKP Securities.

headline: Market post solid gains in Budget week; PSU banks outperform
content: In this week, the Indian rupee added 19 paise to end at 82.92 against the dollar.

headline: Options provide safety net for investors: Shubham Agarwal
content: Shubham Agarwal explains how the Options can create safety nets for the investors.

headline: S&P 500 surges to record closing high on solid earnings, robust data
content: The S&P 500 climbed 1.07% to end the session at 4,958.61 points. The Nasdaq gained 1.74% to 15,628.95 points, while Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.35% to 38,654.42 points.

headline: Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels IPO | Anchor investors pick Rs 409 crore worth shares
content: Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels IPO | The public issue will open for subscription on February 5 and the last day for subscription will be February 7.

headline: IBBI rationalises regulatory framework for insolvency professional entities
content: According to IBBI, the norms that provide for restrictions on the number of assignments that can be undertaken by an IP will not be applicable for IPEs.

headline: Quess Corp's Q3 revenue rises 8% to Rs 4,842 crore, company approves interim dividend
content: The company's profit after tax, however, went down 24.7 percent to Rs 64 crore from Rs 85 crore as Quess Corp accounted for a one-off exceptional expense.

headline: #BoycottZerodha trends after trader takes on leading brokerage for Rs 37,000 refund
content: Jayraj Patil said that he incurred the loss on December 20 because of a tech glitch on the brokerage platform; Zerodha has denied it

headline: Dhanlaxmi Bank Q3 profit declines multi-fold to Rs 3 crore
content: The bank's interest income rose to Rs 308 crore compared to Rs 276 crore in the third quarter of the previous year.

headline: Sebi suggests doing away with 1% deposit mandate for IPO issuers
content: This has been suggested for ease of doing business and because recent reforms have made this requirement redundant, according to the consultation paper

headline: Private capex, Nari Shakti, and energy transition: Saurabh Mukherjea's top themes from Interim Budget
content: Housing finance is going to be a big thing going ahead as the government is focusing on it through the Pradhan Mantri Aawas Yojna, he says.

headline: SBI MF garners over Rs 900 crore from Nifty50 index fund NFO
content: The new fund is an open-ended scheme replicating or tracking the Nifty50 equal weight index, effectively with a relatively lower cost as it is a passive offering.

headline: Northern Arc Capital files IPO papers again, increases fresh issue size to Rs 500 crore
content: Northern Arc Capital IPO | The IPO comprises a fresh issuance of shares worth Rs 500 crore, and an offer-for-sale of 2.1 crore equity shares by several investors.

headline: Kronox Lab Sciences refiles IPO papers with only OFS component, drops fresh issue
content: Kronox Lab Sciences public issue comprises only an offer-for-sale (OFS) of 96 lakh equity shares by promoters.

headline: KIMS Hospital Q3 net profit down 6.4% to Rs 76.5 crore
content: Bed occupancy in the quarter was at 72.2 percent, up by 3.9 percent compared with the same period a year ago.

headline: Pre-election rally to take Nifty to 23400 levels by June this year: ICICI Direct
content: A double bottom in Februar-March period is possible and such volatility should be embraced as a buying opportunity

headline: S&P 500 at record highs but what is the advance decline ratio on NYSE suggesting?
content: The jump in S&P 500 index is mainly on good earnings of most mega cap technology companies, barring Apple and Google. These entities constitute a major portion in the top 10 highest weighted companies in the index.

headline: SBI Q3 results: Net profit plummets 35% to Rs 9,163 crore, asset quality healthy
content: SBI Q3 results: The net interest income (NII) of the country's largest bank stood at Rs 39,815 crore, missing estimates of Rs 40,304 crore.

headline: HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank jointly float residential mortgage-backed securities firm RDCL
content: RMBS Development Company (RDCL) will have ten banks and financial institutions as its shareholders, the lenders informed exchanges.

headline: Daily Voice | Full budget likely to be more energetic for economic development, says Union AMC CEO
content: There is a very clear indication that the government will continue to focus on infrastructure growth. There is a 11 percent growth in capex in this interim budget, says G Pradeepkumar of Union AMC.
